PvtSNa.Description: Private PRCP-Prod Confidential Subnet 1 in us-east-1a CIDR: 10.132.88.0/24

PvtSNb.Description: Private PRCP-Prod Confidential Subnet 2 in us-east-1b CIDR: 10.132.89.0/24

PvtSNc.Description: Private PRCP-Prod Confidential Subnet 3 in us-east-1c CIDR: 10.132.89.0/24

PubSNa.Description: Public PRCP-Prod Subnet 1 in us-east-1a CIDR: 10.132.91.0/25

PubSNb.Description: Public PRCP-Prod Subnet 2 in us-east-1b CIDR: 10.132.91.128/25

PemKey.Description: Name of and existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance

ApplicationID.Description: Application ID - Official Application_ID, this is generated by Sysco's CMDB

Approver.Description: Person approving instance funding.  This should be Email address formatted

Owner.Description: Email address usually Product/ Platform Owner, though team distribution list for technical product/platform team contact

SupportEmail.Description: Email distribution list for technical product/platform team contact

ProjectID.Description: Project_ID - BT Project ID for this workload

2WTAGGER.Description: Used by 2nd Watch Managed Services in shared accounts to determine if a resource is supported

CMPbackup.Description: CMP_backup - This tag is used by 2W document appropriate backup policy for managed workloads

Environment.Description: Name of logical build environment designated for service.
